headline: How Synchrony’s Recent Share Dip and Amazon Deal Could Change Its 2025 Outlook
summary: If you’re holding onto Synchrony Financial or thinking about moving in, you’re not alone in watching its every move lately. After a long run of growth that’s seen the stock climb an impressive 171.6% over five years, recent months have thrown a bit of a curveball: the price has slipped by 5.4% in just the past week and 7.1% over the last 30 days. Even so, year-to-date returns are solidly positive at 7.7%, and the stock remains up a striking 44.4% over the last year. That mix of history and...
